import { createSlice } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

const initialState = [
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Banana', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-05-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
  ]

export const productSlice = createSlice({
  name: 'products',
  initialState,
  reducers: {
    addProduct: (state, action) => {
        state.push(action.payload)
    },
    removeProduct: (state, action) => {

        state = initialState
    }  
  }
})

export const { addProduct, removeProduct } = productSlice.actions

export default productSlice.reducer
